snippet: The company said the addition of Leon Panetta, director of the C.I.A. from 2009 to 2011 and defense secretary from 2011 to 2013, would expand its board to 12 members.
abstract: Business software developer Oracle names Leon E Panetta to its board.
lead_paragraph: The company said the addition of Leon Panetta, director of the C.I.A. from 2009 to 2011 and defense secretary from 2011 to 2013, would expand its board to 12 members.

headline.main: Panetta Is Named as an Oracle Director
headline.print_headline: Panetta Is Named as an Oracle Director
